addonManifest.name: MySQL
addonManifest.description: Provides MySQL databases scoped to a development team.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This add-on assumes that you already have a MySQL instnace running, configured with authentication, and one admin user. The admin username and password are needed to create client databases.
addonManifest.author: P. van Dorp
